quotes.text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
quotes.context: About finding meaning in suffering and pain

quotes.text: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.context: About personal growth and inner transformation

quotes.text: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
quotes.context: About the nature of true love and connection

quotes.text: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quotes.context: About following one's heart and inner calling

quotes.text: The soul has been given its own ears to hear things the mind does not understand.
quotes.context: About the difference between intellectual and spiritual understanding

quotes.text: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop.
quotes.context: About releasing what no longer serves us

quotes.text: The garden of the world has no limits, except in your mind.
quotes.context: About mental limitations and expanding consciousness

quotes.text: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
quotes.context: About living authentically and finding inner joy

quotes.text: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
quotes.context: About creating one's own path and story

quotes.text: The art of knowing is knowing what to ignore.
quotes.context: About the importance of selective attention and focus

quotes.text: Be grateful for your life, every detail of it, and your face will come to shine like a sun, and everyone who sees it will be made glad and peaceful.
quotes.context: About the transformative power of gratitude

quotes.text: The moment you accept what troubles you've been given, the door will open.
quotes.context: About accepting challenges as opportunities for growth

quotes.text: There is a voice that doesn't use words. Listen.
quotes.context: About listening to inner wisdom beyond words

quotes.text: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
quotes.context: About the microcosm containing the macrocosm
